meta.name: discord
meta.title: Discord
meta.description: Manages Discord community messaging, moderation, and announcements.

original_definition.skill_description: Manages Discord community messaging, moderation, and announcements.

actions.name: Fetch Channel Messages
actions.description: Retrieve recent messages from specified Discord channels.

actions.name: Post Announcement
actions.description: Publish an announcement to the target Discord channel.

actions.name: Apply Moderation Action
actions.description: Warn, delete, or restrict users based on policy violations.

rules.name: Verify Bot Permissions
rules.condition_expression: Bot token has required Discord channel permissions

rules.name: Detect Policy Violation
rules.condition_expression: Message content matches moderation policy violations

directives.name: Community Updates Delivered
directives.description: Discord channels are updated with approved announcements and moderation actions.

directives.name: Respect Discord Rate Limits
directives.description: All Discord API calls must stay within documented rate limits.
